widget.name: Stylish
widget.author: Gerald
widget.description: Stylish for Opera 11.64 and below, allowing UserCSS for different URLs, userstyles.org supported.
Stylish for Opera 11.64及以下版本，根据地址来添加UserCSS，支持userstyles.org。
Stylish for Opera 11.64 and below, allowing UserCSS for different URLs, userstyles.org supported.
